content: I've been thinking about that actually. I think I prefer a mix of both. Watching a musical on screen can be really convenient and comfortable, but there's something special about watching it live. I recently watched a local production of "Rent" and it was amazing to see the talent and energy of the cast. But I've also rewatched "Hamilton" on Disney+ recently and that was great too. I think it's nice to have both options depending on the situation.
